.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1

Wall_height
===========

.. table:: Algorithm
   :widths: 15 15 15

   +---------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
   | **Algorithm Name**        | **What is this algorithm for?**   | **Description**                               |
   +===========================+===================================+===============================================+
   | wall_height               | Variables                         | Calculates wall height based on total height. |
   +---------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
